summary: Completed testing of Quantity Engineer features - all 21 backend tests passed, frontend UI verified. Features tested: QE role creation, login/redirect, dashboard stats, planned quantities CRUD, export/import, advanced reports (supplier performance, price variance), price catalog export.
seed_data_creation: Test items created with TEST_ prefix are cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Quantity Engineer features are working correctly. Backend APIs tested: login, dashboard stats, planned quantities CRUD, export/import templates, quantity reports, supplier performance, price variance, price catalog export. Frontend verified: QE dashboard with stats cards, tabs, action buttons, reports tab.

quantity_engineer_role.create_user: PASS - System admin can create users with quantity_engineer role
quantity_engineer_role.login: PASS - QE can login and receives correct role in response
quantity_engineer_role.auto_redirect: PASS - QE redirected to /quantity-engineer dashboard after login

qe_dashboard.stats_display: PASS - Shows total items, remaining qty, due soon, overdue
qe_dashboard.planned_quantities_tab: PASS - Shows list with filters and pagination

planned_quantities.list: PASS - GET /api/pg/quantity/planned returns items with pagination
planned_quantities.filters: PASS - Search, status, pagination filters work

advanced_reports.supplier_performance: PASS - GET /api/pg/reports/advanced/supplier-performance returns report with summary and suppliers
advanced_reports.price_variance: PASS - GET /api/pg/reports/advanced/price-variance returns report with summary
